local_intent: Open the kitchen drawer after confirming visibility and a stable grasp, then verify it is open.
assumptions: Handle is already grasped and aligned for a pull

coherence_with_global: Respects the global plan: after detect-approach-grasp, execute the OpenContainer action and confirm ContainerOpen. Uses same targets (drawer_handle, kitchen_drawer) and timeout bin.
